stories.title: [4] Investigate AI Copilot Integration Friction
stories.description:
## Theme Summary

**Theme**: AI Copilot Integration Friction
**Type**: Pain Point
**Participants**: 4

### Source Breakdown
- Coda: 4

---

## Representative Quotes

### Quote 1
[P1](https://coda.io/d/dQP2YrnN6d)
> The AI assistant doesn't understand context from previous messages. I have to repeat myself constantly.

### Quote 2
[P3](https://coda.io/d/dQP2YrnN6d)
> Copilot suggestions feel random. It doesn't learn from what I accept or reject.

### Quote 3
[P7](https://coda.io/d/dQP2YrnN6d)
> I want the AI to remember my brand voice and style preferences between sessions.

---

## Suggested Investigation

- What user needs does this theme reveal?
- How does this align with product strategy?
- What additional validation is needed?
- What are the potential solutions?
acceptanceCriteria: Theme validated with additional user research
stories.notes: Initial import from database. Low confidence score indicates this story needs significant refinement.

stories.title: [7] Fix Pinterest OAuth Failure
stories.description:
## Problem Statement

Users trying to **restore pinterest posting capability** are getting authorization failed error.

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Occurrences** | 7 reports (4.7% of analyzed) |
| **Product Area** | Integrations |
| **Component** | OAuth |
| **Trigger Context** | Pinterest OAuth connection flow, Pinterest reconnection flow, Pinterest API authentication |

---

## Investigation Paths

Start here to diagnose:

- [ ] Check: OAuth token not being refreshed properly
- [ ] Check: Pinterest app permissions changed or revoked
- [ ] Check: Pinterest API rate limiting or token refresh issue
- [ ] Review logs for: Authorization failed error, Connection timeout, invalid_grant error
- [ ] Inspect `OAuth` component

---

## Symptoms

**What users report:**
- Infinite loading spinner
- Token expired
- 401 Unauthorized
- Re-auth not working

**Technical indicators:**
- Authorization failed error
- Connection timeout
- invalid_grant error
- Scheduled posts failing
- API rejection

---

## Evidence (3 samples)

### Report 1
> I keep getting 'Authorization failed' when trying to connect my Pinterest account. I've tried multiple times but it just spins and fails.

**Flow**: Pinterest OAuth connection flow

### Report 2
> Pinterest integration worked yesterday but now shows 'invalid_grant' error. My clients are waiting on scheduled posts.

**Flow**: Pinterest reconnection flow

### Report 3
> Getting 401 Unauthorized from Pinterest API. Tried revoking and re-adding but same issue.

**Flow**: Pinterest API authentication
acceptanceCriteria: Error no longer occurs for reported scenarios
Verified with at least one affected user/account
stories.notes: Initial import from database. Higher confidence score than story-001. Good starting point for refinement - has technical context and symptoms.
